content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function with derivative given by <math alttext=" f prime of x, equals, x squared minus a, squared, which equals, open parenthesis, x minus a, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, x plus a, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is a positive constant. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="negative a, less than x, less than a, " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> for <math alttext="negative a, less than x, less than a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></math>.

<math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="x less than negative a, " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x is greater than a, " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="x less than negative a, " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x greater than a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="x less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> for <math alttext="x less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="x less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f double prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> for <math alttext="x less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing for <math alttext="negative a, less than x, less than a, " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math> for <math alttext="negative a, less than x, less than a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></math>.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
